Security

This section describes the different security features available as part of the Talaria TWO InnoPhase IoT solutions. These security features are included to:

  • Provide a secure way of loading encrypted and signed applications

  • Prevent loading of unauthorized applications and executing a flash readout of application contents

Secureboot

  • Secureboot

Network Security

  • Network Security – Wi-Fi
  • Transport Layer Security (TLS) 1.3 compatibility
  • Secure Provisioning
  • Secure Over the Air Upgrades
